title: Introduction to C Programming
description: The C programming language is a procedural and general-purpose language that provides low-level access to system memory.

title: Introduction to Algorithms
description: Algorithm means, A set of finite rules or instructions to be followed in calculations or other problem-solving operations.

title: Introduction to C++ for DSA
description: C++ is an object-oriented programming (OOP) language that is viewed by many as the best language for creating large-scale applications.

title: Basic Data Structures
description: A data structure is a specialized format for organizing, processing, retrieving and storing data.

title: Introduction to OOP Python
description: In Python,object-oriented Programming (OOPs) is a programming paradigm that uses objects and classes in programming.

title: Software Engineering
description: A software engineer is a person who applies the engineering design process to design, develop, maintain, test, and evaluate computer.

title: AWS, Cloud Computing
description: Cloud computing is the delivery of online services (such as servers, databases, software) to users.

title: Database (MySQL)
description: MySQL is an Oracle-backed open source relational database management system (RDBMS) based on SQL.

title: Problem-Solving Part
description: Problem solving is the process of achieving a goal by overcoming obstacles, a frequent part of most activities
